meaningMnemonic: You know what 千円 is (1000 yen). So if you add a <kanji>bill</kanji> to that you get a <vocabulary>thousand yen bill</vocabulary>. That's just the little rectangular piece of money that is worth 1000 yen.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
